arts.ttl: 'Difficult to think': Enzo Maresca makes claim about Joao Felix straight after Chelsea's defeat to Brighton
arts.sum: Chelsea crashed out of the FA Cup last night with an unconvincing display that led to a 2-1 defeat to Brighton at the Amex stadium....

arts.ttl: Reece James absence vs Brighton explained as Enzo Maresca confirms Chelsea plan
arts.sum: Enzo Maresca has confirmed the reason behind Reece James' absence from the Chelsea matchday squad in the FA Cup defeat to Brighton. There was some concern on Saturday night after James was not included in the Chelsea squad that travelled to Brighton for FA Cup tie.

arts.ttl: Enzo Maresca dreams of 1-0 victories after Chelsea bow out of FA Cup at Brighton
arts.sum: The Blues led but were beaten 2-1 by the Seagulls in the fourth round tie on Saturday night.

arts.ttl: Enzo Maresca says Chelsea discovered undroppable star during Brighton FA Cup defeat
arts.sum: Chelsea suffered a 2-1 defeat to Brighton in the FA Cup fourth round, with Enzo Maresca starting Christopher Nkunku up front instead of injured striker Nicolas Jackson

arts.ttl: Chelsea boss Maresca bemoans ‘clear’ Brighton handball
arts.sum: Chelsea head coach Enzo Maresca believes Brighton’s second goal should have been ruled out for handball as his side crashed out of the FA Cup. Bart Verbruggen spilled a Cole Palmer shot to give the Blues an early lead at the Amex Stadium, but Giorginio Rutter equalised soon after. Kaoru Mitoma went on to grab […] The post Chelsea boss Maresca bemoans ‘clear’ Brighton handball first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Brighton boss ‘proud’ as magic Mitoma knocks out Chelsea
arts.sum: Brighton manager Fabian Hurzeler expressed immense pride in his players after they bounced back from their heavy defeat to Nottingham Forest to knock Chelsea out of the FA Cup. Four minutes after the kickoff goalkeeper Bart Verbruggen fumbled a shot from Cole Palmer into his own net in a nightmare start for the Seagulls at […] The post Brighton boss ‘proud’ as magic Mitoma knocks out Chelsea first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: 'Important not to overreact' - Fabian Hurzeler issues important advice to players and fans after beating Chelsea
arts.sum: Fabian Hurzeler said he ‘stayed calm’ after the heavy defeat at Nottingham Forest – and that provided the foundation for Brighton to prove a lot of doubters wrong against Chelsea in tonight’s FA Cup win.

arts.ttl: Brighton player ratings vs Chelsea: One 9 and plenty of 8s as superb Seagulls bounce back from horror defeat
arts.sum: Brighton and Hove Albion staged a superb comeback victory to knock Chelsea out of the FA Cup and secure their first home win since November.

arts.ttl: Brighton come from behind to beat Chelsea
arts.sum: Brighton come from behind to beat Chelsea 2-1 and progress to the fifth round of the FA Cup.

arts.ttl: Brighton come from behind to knock Chelsea out of FA Cup
arts.sum: Kaoru Mitoma struck the second-half winner on the south coast.
